tabs.title: Scenario
tabs.content:
**ZenithWorks** has a rapidly growing Azure environment with multiple subscriptions managed by different development teams. The Cloud Governance team needs visibility into resource deployments across all subscriptions.

**Governance Requirements:**
- Generate a monthly report of all new Azure Resource Manager (ARM) resource deployments
- The report generation process should be automated
- The solution must capture deployment metadata including timestamps, resource types, and deployment principals
- Sensitive API keys used by the reporting tool must be stored securely
- The reporting application should authenticate to Azure resources without managing credentials manually

**Database Requirements:**
- ZenithWorks plans to migrate an existing high-priority inventory database to Azure
- The database requires 99.99% availability SLA
- The solution must support zone redundancy to survive datacenter failures
- Automatic failover capability is required to minimize downtime
